short.el: Το Facebook Album Downloader σάς επιτρέπει να κατεβάζετε απεριόριστα άλμπουμ από οποιαδήποτε σελίδα στο Facebook.

short.es: Facebook Album Downloader te permite descargar álbumes ilimitados desde cualquier página de Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏆Best tool made for people who want to download Facebook albums.

A brilliant albums export tool that allows you to quickly download Facebook albums with just one click!

🖖  KEY FEATURES:

Download FB albums with one click.

🚗 DESCRIPTION Step by Step:

1.Click the download button.

🔎  HOW DOES IT WORK:

Using Facebook's official API to export data.
Free user can export the first 50 records.
Paid users can export without limits. Only $2.99!

🔒  USAGE POLICY

No password required.
All the data you export is processed locally, so no one knows what you download.
